name: Clefairy
flavorText:
Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

previous.name: Nidoking
previous.flavorText:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.

next.name: Clefable
next.flavorText:
A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

pokemon.name: Cleffa
pokemon.flavorText:
Because of its
unusual, star-like
silhouette, people believe that it
came here on
a meteor.
